dmca.title: [ABUSE] Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing Activity
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, June 13, 2005 6:12 PM
To: Internet2@take2-Antipiracy.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing
Activity]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing
Activity
Date: Mon, 13 Jun 2005 13:24:02 +0100
From: T2AntiPiracy02 <Internet2@take2-Antipiracy.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>,        <copyright@theplanet.com>

VIA EMAIL:

Demand for Immediate Take-Down: Notice of Infringing Activity

URL:
http://www.zonegamesset.com/tracker/details.php?id=8902a186a36efa9498e178379
dda06a60cf33546,
http://www.zonegamesset.com/tracker/download.php?id=8902a186a36efa9498e17837
9dda06a60cf33546
<http://www.zonegamesset.com/tracker/download.php?id=8902a186a36efa9498e1783
79dda06a60cf33546&f=XBOX-GTA%20San%20Andreas%20PAL%20MULTI5%20WORKING%20FULL
DVD.torrent>
&f=XBOX-GTA%20San%20Andreas%20PAL%20MULTI5%20WORKING%20FULLDVD.torrent

13 June 2005

Dear Sir or Madam,

Take 2 has received information that the domain listed above, which appears
to be on servers under your control, is offering unlicensed copies of, or is
engaged in other unauthorized activities relating to copyrighted computer
games published by Take 2.

1. Identification of copyrighted works:

Computer game(s):
Xbox: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas

Copyright owner:
Take-Two Interactive Software, Inc

2. Infringing material or activity found at the following location(s):
http://www.zonegamesset.com/tracker/details.php?id=8902a186a36efa9498e178379
dda06a60cf33546,
http://www.zonegamesset.com/tracker/download.php?id=8902a186a36efa9498e17837
9dda06a60cf33546
<http://www.zonegamesset.com/tracker/download.php?id=8902a186a36efa9498e1783
79dda06a60cf33546&f=XBOX-GTA%20San%20Andreas%20PAL%20MULTI5%20WORKING%20FULL
DVD.torrent>
&f=XBOX-GTA%20San%20Andreas%20PAL%20MULTI5%20WORKING%20FULLDVD.torrent

The above Computer game(s) is being made available for copying, through
downloading, at the above location without authorization of the copyright
owner.

3. Statement of authority:

I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that the information in this
notice is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of Take 2, the
owner of the copyright(s) in the work(s) identified above. I have a good
faith belief that none of the materials or activities listed above have been
authorized by Take 2, its agents, or the law.

We hereby give notice of these activities to you and request that you take
expeditious action to remove or disable access to the material described
above, and thereby prevent the illegal reproduction and distribution of this
computer game via your company's network.

We appreciate your cooperation in this matter. Please advise us regarding
what actions you take.

Yours sincerely,

James Young
Internet Investigator

on behalf of Take-Two Interactive Software, Inc
622 Broadway
New York, NY 10012
United States of America

E-mail: internet1@take2-antipiracy.com



- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCrhLUvK/XpJs6oyURAvVBAJ0aYlYSu34hg3Lh8GSVPVZhCoj7ZwCfQOCW
KqW7de2FlRYI7Z6xFT1hyHs=
=Wfvg
